items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars OH BOY!
items.body: In the interest of full disclosure... I'm 5'5"/237 and probably shouldn't be buying ANY clothes until the Wegovy kicks in for real. But, just as a test, because these things never work out when ya got curves (No matter my size, my waist to-bum differential is... significant), and I definitely prefer a skim fit over a sausage casing no matter my weight. I ordered the XXL in Brown, first(ðŸ˜‰), because Brown (especially Black Coffee Brown, which this, unfortunately, is not ðŸ˜ª, - though it's still gorgeous) is VERY hard to find. I felt an extremely unusual thing when I pulled the dress from the bag: POSITIVITY. And, guess what? I quickly put it on and was SO impressed. It was perfect! I still can't believe I'm not nursing disappointment again. Bearing in mind the size I got (XXL), and MY stats (5'5"/currently 237, but working on that)..... * This dress is a semi-clingy skim-fit (Neither tight, nor loose), with great stretch. Very forgiving. Very flattering, considering. * It is a fine ribbed-knit MATTE weave. It has none of that weird unnatural glossy sheen you see in the weave of so many of these column style dresses, * Nice texture, feels soft. *The fiber label reads 70% Viscose and 30% Chinlon (an internet search states that ChinLon stands for CHINese NyLON, described as a finer, smoother fiber that's more durable and resiliant than nylon/poly). * Care instructions read: "Machine wash Cold, Gentle. Wash separately. Do not bleach. Tumble dry LOW, remove promptly. Iron LOW. DO NOT USE FABRIC SOFTENER. DO NOT DRY CLEAN." * Because I have no idea if this fiber will pill I will wash the dress inside-out, in a large, fine mesh bag. I will use a color guard detergent, though maybe unnecessary. Nonetheless, I don't take any chances with colors and fading, and that stuff works! I strongly suspect if I mess up this dress (THESE dressES... Stay tunedðŸ˜‰), I'll never find another style which pleases me as well. Neither the sleeve cuffs, at the wrists, nor the hem are serged or sewn, but are self-knit finished. So, if any of the lengths are too long for you I'm not sure IF they can be altered easily (without unraveling, etc.) or at all. I have slightly long-ish arms and the cuffs hit about 2" too long on me. I might look into finding a top-tier tailor to see if that can be adjusted - but will likely simply turn them up at the wrist, since that looks perfectly fine. I am happy with the hem length, for now, since the hem on me hits just below the knee. The really good news is that, if you're thinking you may want or need to take in the dress at the sides it DOES have side seams, which should make doing so a little easier, though you would still likely need a pro or the skill level of one (unravelling, again) to do it without causing irreperable damage. I have tried enough columnar turtleneck sweater dresses through the years to know they rarely fit right or look anything like the picture (and these dresses are always shown on very thin, not curvy, women) so I wasn't expecting anything akin to satisfaction. Honestly, I couldn't be happier to see, finally, someone got the fit of a classy turtleneck column sweater dress right - and at a reasonable price point. This is the only one I've been VERY happy with. Obviously, I immediately ordered the deeper shade of heather gray, the black, and the Camel, because I'm all about The (neutral) Capsule Wardrobe. These dresses are fast selling out so, hopefully, Amazon will make sure they don't disappear. If your interest is piqued, I REALLY wouldn't hesitate. It's just dumb luck that I ordered the brown yesterday, got it today, loved it, and was able to immediately order three more colors before they ran out. But nothing's a done deal until you have it in your hands so ðŸ¤ž Read more
items.author: Blossom

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great looking sweater dress
items.body: Nice quality material/construction and fits well. Washes well too. Read more
items.author: mtvector

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fit and quality
items.body: Really a cute warm dress for the season. Nice fit, nice thickness and quality. Does not look cheap, so far it is wrinkly resistant and maintains it shape after washing. Read more
items.author: Christina

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice simple black sweater dress
items.body: Bought this dress, unfortunately, for my momâ€™s funeral. Since itâ€™s cold outside I needed a warmer material that I could wear inside & outside. This material worked for that. I wore it with a nice thick multicolored pink scarf. My mom liked pink. The style is casual but elegant. Itâ€™s a midi length. The stretch of the fabric is good. The turtleneck was a bit snug (I donâ€™t like any pressure on my neck), so I stretched it to the point of breaking a couple of threads. It fit better after that. I wore a stretchy belt with the dress to give it a visual stopping place as the dress is long and straight & mostly fitted. It would look good on a curvy figure too. Itâ€™s a comfortable dress. I added short boots & leg warmers. Iâ€™m glad I bought it. I didnâ€™t have to think about the dress, meaning no issues with it. I would recommend it. Read more
items.author: Shannon

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love!
items.body: This was very comfortable and flattering. Love this dress! Read more
items.author: Shanna Record

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Thick & heavy sweater dress.
items.body: Love this dress & it fits well for my petite size. The sweater material is heavy & thick. After reading the other reviews, I bought this dress in 2 colors but in 2 different sizes, one Small & one Extra Small. They both fit the same but the XS was shorter. Both will do nicely. Will pair with a chain belt. Will try to update with pictures at a later date. Read more
items.author: Robin D.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Versatile dress
items.body: Nice stretch. Great fit. Cute and comfortable. Versatile use for both maternity and postpartum. Loved it so much, i got more colors. Read more
items.author: Lady Char

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Nice quality fabric, but I didn't like the cut
items.body: My first impression of the dress was that it was heavy (in a good quality way). The fabric was thick, and felt warm when I tried it on (definitely a fall/winter garment). My issue is with the cut of the dress. I ordered according to the size chart waist measurement, and while this dress fit pretty well from the waist down (I would have preferred it a little bit tighter), the bodice was incredibly loose. There was this mass of unused space right under my armpits. I think it might work better on someone with a bigger bust size. In the end I returned it due to my issues with the fit, but I had no issues with the quality. Read more
items.author: Aeri V.

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.
about_this_item:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.
long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Brown, Beige/Pink, Deep Coffee, Blue, Dark Grey, Apricot, Army Green, Black, Camel, Dusty Blue, Beige/Orange, Red, Beige/Grey, Deep Blue. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
